message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I think it will be very valuable for you, and I'm excited to see what you can do with it.
Thank you for considering me for the product, Alice. I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find value in it at a lower price. Would you be willing to consider $18,000 for the product?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price. I could come down to $19,000. I believe this still reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still not convinced that the product is worth $19,000. Could we perhaps meet somewhere in the middle? How about $17,500?
